texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: author: Major Hayden date: '2024-08-22' Instead of dreading a long stretch of meetings, find some ways to make them less painful. tags:
texts.text: author: Major Hayden date: '2024-08-22' Instead of dreading a long stretch of meetings, find some ways to make them less painful. tags:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: advice
texts.text: advice

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: meetings
texts.text: meetings

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: work
texts.text: work

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Ask anyone about the toughest part of their workday and it usually comes down to one thing: meetings. There are plenty of reasons:
texts.text: Ask anyone about the toughest part of their workday and it usually comes down to one thing: meetings. There are plenty of reasons:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The meeting could have been an email
texts.text: The meeting could have been an email

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Nobody notices when I attend the meeting, but they notice when I don't
texts.text: Nobody notices when I attend the meeting, but they notice when I don't

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The meeting is recurring whether there's something important to talk about or not
texts.text: The meeting is recurring whether there's something important to talk about or not

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: There's no time for questions after everyone presents in a meeting
texts.text: There's no time for questions after everyone presents in a meeting

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Someone dominates the conversation
texts.text: Someone dominates the conversation

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This was a central problem in my  "Five tips for a thriving technology career"  talk that I delivered this year. I wrote a  recap  on the blog earlier this summer as well.
texts.text: This was a central problem in my  "Five tips for a thriving technology career"  talk that I delivered this year. I wrote a  recap  on the blog earlier this summer as well.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I came up with some more ideas since then, so let's go!
texts.text: I came up with some more ideas since then, so let's go!

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Use headphones or earbuds
texts.text: Use headphones or earbuds

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I find it much easier to understand people in meetings when I have the audio closer to my ears. This helps a lot with understanding non-native English speakers or some native English speakers with thick accents. It reduces the noise from various things in my house (kids, pets, appliances) and allows me to focus on the small sounds that are important for understanding someone else.
texts.text: I find it much easier to understand people in meetings when I have the audio closer to my ears. This helps a lot with understanding non-native English speakers or some native English speakers with thick accents. It reduces the noise from various things in my house (kids, pets, appliances) and allows me to focus on the small sounds that are important for understanding someone else.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: How many times have you been in a meeting with someone who talks constantly without earbuds or headphones and you can't break through with your own voice? Some computers will mute the incoming audio to avoid feedback sounds and you'll totally miss it when someone is trying to get your attention.
texts.text: How many times have you been in a meeting with someone who talks constantly without earbuds or headphones and you can't break through with your own voice? Some computers will mute the incoming audio to avoid feedback sounds and you'll totally miss it when someone is trying to get your attention.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I was once in a meeting where an attendee spoke at length about a topic that was already covered and multiple people tried to speak to let him know that he could stop. He was completely oblivious. The situation improved a lot recently with the addition of "raised hands" indicators in most meeting applications, but it's still not perfect.
texts.text: I was once in a meeting where an attendee spoke at length about a topic that was already covered and multiple people tried to speak to let him know that he could stop. He was completely oblivious. The situation improved a lot recently with the addition of "raised hands" indicators in most meeting applications, but it's still not perfect.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Background music
texts.text: Background music

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you typically join meetings without earbuds or headphones, then this suggestion isn't for you. Also, you should go back and re-read the previous section.  ️😜
texts.text: If you typically join meetings without earbuds or headphones, then this suggestion isn't for you. Also, you should go back and re-read the previous section.  ️😜

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Everyone has their own music preferences, but I find that playing some relaxing music at a low volume really helps me stay focused during meetings. I change the genre of music between different days depending on my mood. No matter what you choose, consider music without vocals to avoid distractions.
texts.text: Everyone has their own music preferences, but I find that playing some relaxing music at a low volume really helps me stay focused during meetings. I change the genre of music between different days depending on my mood. No matter what you choose, consider music without vocals to avoid distractions.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: A good place to start is Lofi Girl's "beats to relax/study to" playlist. You can listen on  Spotify  or on  YouTube . Very few songs have vocals, and if they do, it's barely noticeable. I've found that I can keep this playlist on for hours without getting bored of it.
texts.text: A good place to start is Lofi Girl's "beats to relax/study to" playlist. You can listen on  Spotify  or on  YouTube . Very few songs have vocals, and if they do, it's barely noticeable. I've found that I can keep this playlist on for hours without getting bored of it.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This can be especially helpful for those marathon half or full day meetings. 👔
texts.text: This can be especially helpful for those marathon half or full day meetings. 👔

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Ask about taking notes
texts.text: Ask about taking notes

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Most meeting platforms offer transcription and audio/video recording already, but transcriptions are difficult to read and recordings aren't usually fun to watch. I love it when someone takes some concise notes about the points that were raised, who raised them, and who holds the action items to solve them.
texts.text: Most meeting platforms offer transcription and audio/video recording already, but transcriptions are difficult to read and recordings aren't usually fun to watch. I love it when someone takes some concise notes about the points that were raised, who raised them, and who holds the action items to solve them.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If nobody's taking notes, ask if you can!
texts.text: If nobody's taking notes, ask if you can!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It's a great way to ensure you pay attention and the people who missed the meeting will thank you later. Nobody has turned me down yet when I've asked.
texts.text: It's a great way to ensure you pay attention and the people who missed the meeting will thank you later. Nobody has turned me down yet when I've asked.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This can also be helpful if someone likes to talk over everyone else during the meeting or if someone birdwalks into other topics. Un-mute yourself and ask:
texts.text: This can also be helpful if someone likes to talk over everyone else during the meeting or if someone birdwalks into other topics. Un-mute yourself and ask:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Wait, are we still on that previous topic or have we moved to something else?
texts.text: Wait, are we still on that previous topic or have we moved to something else?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Another favorite question of mine is:
texts.text: Another favorite question of mine is:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Did we get an action item for that previous topic? Who owns that item?
texts.text: Did we get an action item for that previous topic? Who owns that item?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Your note taking keeps speakers on track and ensures there is accountability and ownership for problems that need to be solved. It's also a great way to get your name in front of other people during larger meetings.
texts.text: Your note taking keeps speakers on track and ensures there is accountability and ownership for problems that need to be solved. It's also a great way to get your name in front of other people during larger meetings.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Decline that meeting!
texts.text: Decline that meeting!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This one got the biggest reaction during my talk at Texas Linux Fest. Sometimes you just need to decline a meeting. Certain aspects of a meeting will push me to the "No" button faster than others, but here's my two biggest red flags:
texts.text: This one got the biggest reaction during my talk at Texas Linux Fest. Sometimes you just need to decline a meeting. Certain aspects of a meeting will push me to the "No" button faster than others, but here's my two biggest red flags:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='More than three attendees:'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='More than three attendees:'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Missing agenda:'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Missing agenda:'>]

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You are the only one that can advocate for your own time. Nobody else is going to do that for you[^admin]. A very talented executive once told me:
texts.text: You are the only one that can advocate for your own time. Nobody else is going to do that for you[^admin]. A very talented executive once told me:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Time is the most valuable thing you bring to work every day. You can't get more of it, but you can waste it. Your experience and knowledge means nothing if you don't have time to use it. Treat your time as your most precious asset.
texts.text: Time is the most valuable thing you bring to work every day. You can't get more of it, but you can waste it. Your experience and knowledge means nothing if you don't have time to use it. Treat your time as your most precious asset.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: [^admin]: An administrative assistant can help but I've never had one before. 😜
texts.text: [^admin]: An administrative assistant can help but I've never had one before. 😜
